forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers after noon. Cloudy, with a high near 58. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 48. Northeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 68. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
